MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L8 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Princes Road and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:04AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:21AM on 12th  November 2020
